modName: OP clean savegame for KICKASS playthrough
summary:
This is for players who just wanna kickass from the start of the game.
Just my overpowerd nord male save game...
descriptionHtml:
Lets begin by apologising forÂ my bad english its not my native language


Just my overpowerd nord male Dovahkiin save game at the beginning of the game in helgen
All perks are unlocked.
Got mostly all the shouts and spells of master difficulty
Didn't want to have all the spells because it makes the menu too full
I do have lesser spells only the ones I find usefull
Got enough magicka, health and stamina
although you can still die especially on higher difficulty (Legendary)

You need the DLC: dawnguard and dragonborn to have this...
Got an amulet to make the best OP armor plus a ring that can summen karstaag unlimited times (although you have to unequip and equip the ring to work again after 2 times using it).

BTW:
It is a clean save... What I mean by it is that I didn't use any mod before saving this save.

Hope you people like it enjoy
author: Ratjico
